name: Uphill Transport: Oil Tanker T
description:
Uphill Transport: Oil Tanker Truck got powerful engine to pull long trailers both on uphill and mountain climb. This is future truck is one of the new truck simulations game which is made to improve trucker simulator driving skills. Take deep breath to focus on road edges of steep hill tracks that are filled with mud and trash. The oil hunt has begun for trucking fuel to New York city so be the best oil transporter driver to ride this 16 wheeler Vehicle.
- Hard to drive while climbing mountains
- Realistic big truck sounds
- Real trailer mechanics to transport cars
- It is one of the free truck driving games and can be play offline
- Heavy Truck Driving Simulation with Smooth Steering driving controls
